resources.string:
Since March 2019, Google prohibited the access to the call log to all call recording apps. In order to identify a caller number, please, enable Call Recorder ACR App Connector in your device's Accessibility Settings.

In case a caller's number wasn't identified, you can set it manually via the recording's context menu.

App Connector is also required to record cellular calls on Android 10 devices.

NOTE: App Connector requires Accessibility Services permission.
Enable Call Recorder ACR App Connector
